We recruit, train and consult for the industry with twenty years of knowledge of the industry's requirements in human resources.

We cater for Hotels, Restaurants, Hospitals , Guesthouses, Bars, Catering Companies, Cafes, Leisure Centres, Heritage Centres and Fast-food outlets. Please click here for a more detailed view of our recruitment areas.

We are based in Cork but operate a Nation-wide service, and indeed service some international outlets.

  • Recruitment of all levels and grades of staff
  • Consultancy & Manpower Planning
  • Human Resource Management
  • In-service Training and Development
  • Implementation of quality audits and mystery guest reporting
